I'll need you to clarify a bit more what exactly you're experiencing. Unfortunately, the word "lag" is often used as a catch-all term for lots of different issues.

One thing I can for sure mention is that we've seen some poor performance with the Beta Client when run on low-spec computers.
I feel your pain! I think it was weird of Riot to release a client that would cause this much lag without warning us first.
